We're looking for a Data Analytics Intern who is passionate about analytics, curious about business, and eager to learn by doing. This internship provides a unique opportunity to work alongside a high-performing team on meaningful projects that directly support sales operations, market intelligence, and pricing strategies. What You'll Do As a Data Analytics Intern, you will gain hands-on experience in data collection, reporting, visualization, and analysis. You'll contribute to real business decisions by supporting the development and maintenance of dashboards and data tools across various functions. Key responsibilities include: • Generate and update rebate reports using established scripts and processes. • Maintain and publish reports and dashboards via Power BI Server. • Review reports for accuracy and completeness before distribution. • Collect and process data from internal sources (SAP, MicroStrategy) and third-party tools (e.g., Circana). • Support regular updates to dashboards for strategic pricing, customer profiling, competitor intelligence, and forecasting. • Conduct analyses to identify customer trends and competitor pricing strategies. • Visualize data through dashboards and presentations for internal teams. • Participate in team meetings, take notes, and assist with follow-up actions. • Handle ad-hoc data and reporting requests as needed.
